required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of RC18 Administered Subcutaneously to Subjects With IgA(Immunoglobulin A) Nephropathy
clinical_study.official_title: Phase II Clinical Trial of RC18(Recombinant Human B Lymphocyte Stimulator Receptor - Antibody Fusion Protein for Injection) in the Treatment of IgA Nephropathy

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of Tai Ai (Recombinant Human B Lymphocyte Stimulator Receptor-Antibody Fusion Protein for Injection) in the treatment of IgA nephropathy.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in 24-hour urine protein excretion level at Week 24;
primary_outcome.description: 24-hour urine protein measures the amount of protein released in urine over a 24-hour period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in urine protein/creatine ratio(UPCR) and/or urine albumin/ creatine ratio(UACR)
secondary_outcome.description: Each center tested for UPCR and / or UACR needs to be as consistent as possible.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the count of urine red blood cells
secondary_outcome.description: The method of measuring the urine red blood cells in each center needs to be as consistent as possible.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the values of Immunoglobulin G(IgG);
secondary_outcome.description: The content of IgG was detected by immunological index.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the values of Immunoglobulin M(IgM);
secondary_outcome.description: The content of IgM was detected by immunological index.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the values of Immunoglobulin A(IgA);
secondary_outcome.description: The content of IgG was detected by immunological index.

secondary_outcome.measure: 1. Change from baseline in the values of B-lymphocyte (CD19+)
secondary_outcome.description: The content of B-lymphocyte was detected by immunological index.

secondary_outcome.measure: 1. Change from baseline in the values of complement 3（C3）
secondary_outcome.description: The content of complement 3 was detected by immunological index.

secondary_outcome.measure: 1. Change from baseline in the values of complement 4 (C4)
secondary_outcome.description: The content of complement 4 was detected by immunological index.

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence rate and severity of adverse events.
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of multiple intravitreal injection of each group.

arm_group.description: RC18 160mg SC once weekly ,and total of 24 doses
RC18 240mg SC once weekly ,and total of 24 doses
Placebo SC once weekly ,and total of 24 doses

intervention.description: subcutaneous injection RC18 160mg on the upper arm, abdomen, or upper thigh outside;
subcutaneous injection RC18 240mg on the upper arm, abdomen, or upper thigh outside;
subcutaneous injection placebo on the upper arm, abdomen, or upper thigh outside;
